## Stop the Clock Proposal(2025/0044) 
This proposal has already been enacted into law. Its inclusion here serves to ensure consistency and provide timelines of prior decisions.

```{=html}
      <iframe width="780" height="500" src="https://law-tracker.europa.eu/procedure/2025_44" title="Stop the Clock Proposal"></iframe>
```

The "Stop the Clock" proposal is the informal name for the legislative initiative that, once adopted, became Directive (EU) 2025/794, which formally amends Directives (EU) 2022/2464 and (EU) 2024/1760 to postpone certain corporate sustainability reporting and due diligence requirements. <a href="https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/PDF/?uri=OJ:L_202500794">Below is the official legislation.</a>

```{=html}
      <iframe width="780" height="500" src="https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/PDF/?uri=OJ:L_202500794" title="Stop the Clock Proposal"></iframe>
```
